services.name: OpenWeather API
services.description: Real-time weather data and forecasts for any location worldwide

intents.name: get_current_weather
intents.description: Get current weather conditions for a specific location

intents.name: get_forecast
intents.description: Get weather forecast for the next 5 days

intents.name: get_weather_alerts
intents.description: Get severe weather alerts for a region

services.description: Process payments and manage billing for your applications

intents.name: create_payment
intents.description: Process a one-time payment

intents.description: Set up recurring subscription billing

intents.name: refund_payment
intents.description: Issue a refund for a previous payment

intents.name: get_payment_history
intents.description: Retrieve payment history for a customer

services.name: SendGrid Email API
services.description: Send transactional and marketing emails at scale

intents.name: send_email
intents.description: Send a single email to one or more recipients

intents.name: send_template_email
intents.description: Send an email using a predefined template

intents.name: schedule_email
intents.description: Schedule an email to be sent at a future time

services.name: Google Maps API
services.description: Geocoding, directions, and place information worldwide

intents.name: geocode_address
intents.description: Convert an address to geographic coordinates

intents.name: get_directions
intents.description: Get directions between two locations

intents.name: find_nearby_places
intents.description: Find places of interest near a location

intents.name: get_place_details
intents.description: Get detailed information about a specific place

services.name: Twilio SMS API

intents.name: send_sms

intents.name: send_mms

intents.name: get_message_status
intents.description: Check the delivery status of a sent message
